content:
You're welcome! It was my pleasure to assist you in planning your trip. I'm thrilled to hear that you're excited to explore Costa Rica and Thailand!

Remember to stay curious, be open-minded, and always prioritize your safety and well-being. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further guidance.

As you embark on this incredible adventure, I wish you:

* Unforgettable experiences with new friends and locals
* Delicious food and drinks that tantalize your taste buds
* Breathtaking scenery and outdoor activities that leave you in awe
* Meaningful interactions with the local culture and communities
* A sense of wonder and discovery that stays with you long after your trip

Safe travels, and I hope you have the time of your life in Costa Rica and Thailand!

P.S. Don't forget to share your travel stories and photos with me when you return!
